channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 00:36 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 00:36 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by subsequent messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 00:35 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
